Album: 不朽的声音(人生最难忘的歌)
Lyric:
[offset:500][00:22.540]I'm lying alone with my head on the phone
[00:27.140]Thinking of you till it hurts
[00:31.220]I know you hurt too but what else can we do
[00:35.750]Tormented and torn apart
[00:40.490]I wish I could carry your smile in my heart
[00:44.800]For times when my life seems so low
[00:49.60]It would make me believe what tomorrow could bring
[00:53.500]When today doesn't really know, doesn't really know
[01:00.210]I'm all out of love, I'm so lost without you
[01:04.900]I know you were right, believing for so long
[01:09.350]I'm all out of love, what am I without you
[01:13.690]I can't be too late to say that I was so wrong
[01:22.230]I want you to come back and carry me home
[01:26.840]Away from these long, lonely nights
[01:31.90]I'm reaching for you, are you feeling it too?
[01:35.120]does the feeling seem oh, so right?
[01:39.680]And what would you say if I called on you now
[01:44.80]And said that I can't hold on?
[01:48.250]There's no easy way, it gets harder each day
[01:52.620]Please love me or I'll be gone, I'll be gone
[01:59.710]I'm all out of love, I'm so lost without you
[02:04.120]I know you were right, believing for so long
[02:08.250]I'm all out of love, what am I without you
[02:12.710]I can't be too late to say that I was so wrong
[02:21.690]Ooh, what are you thinking of
[02:28.579]What are you thinking of
[02:32.450]What are you thinking of
[02:37.0]what are you thinking of
[02:48.250]I'm all out of love, I'm so lost without you
[02:53.220]I know you were right, believing for so long
[02:57.770]I'm all out of love, what am I without you
[03:02.300]I can't be too late to say that I was so wrong
[03:06.720]I'm all out of love, I'm so lost without you
[03:11.210]I know you were right, believing for so long
[03:15.470]I'm all out of love, what am I without you
[03:20.40]I can't be too late to say that I was so wrong
